SimpleGF2.jl

  • Readme
  • Docstrings
    • Docstrings
    Docstrings
    SimpleGF2.GF2
    SimpleGF2.SimpleGF2
    SimpleGF2.add_row_to_row! — Function.

    add_row_to_row!(A,i,j) adds row i to row j in the matrix A.

    SimpleGF2.eval
    SimpleGF2.include
    SimpleGF2.nullity — Function.

    nullity(A) returns the dimension of the nullspace of A.

    SimpleGF2.rref — Function.

    rref(A) returns the row reduced echelon form of A.

    SimpleGF2.rref! — Function.

    rref!(A) overwrites A with its row reduced echelon form.

    SimpleGF2.solve — Function.

    solve(A,b) returns a solution x to the linear system A*x == b or throws an error if no solution can be found.

    SimpleGF2.solve_all — Function.

    solve_all(A,b) returns a solution to A*x==b together with a basis for the nullspace of A.

    SimpleGF2.solve_augmented
    SimpleGF2.swap_rows! — Function.

    swap_rows!(A,i,j) swaps rows i and j in the matrix A.
